12 class GenericFloatBioSignalProcessor: public IBioSignalProcessorCallback<float> {
13 
14 public:
15

19  static const float DEFAULT_FREQUENCY;

21 
22  explicit GenericFloatBioSignalProcessor(IInputSignal<float> *input):numberOfDimensions(input->get_dimensionality())
23  , frequency(input->get_frequency()) {
24

26  };

29 
36  void process_data_point(IInputSignal<float> *signal,
37  IBioSignalProcessor<float> *processor,
38  const float data[], int64_t timeStamp) override {
39 
40  numberOfSamples++;
41 
42  for ( int i=0; i < numberOfDimensions; i++ ) {
43  auto n = (float)numberOfSamples;
44  averageValue[i] = lastAverageValue[i] + (data[i] - lastAverageValue[i]) / n;
45  lastAverageValue[i] = averageValue[i];
46  lastSquareSummationValue[i] = lastSquareSummationValue[i] + std::pow(data[i], 2.0);
47  rmsValue[i] = pow(lastSquareSummationValue[i] / (float)numberOfSamples, 0.5 );
48 
49  if ( numberOfSamples > 1 ) {
50  firstDerivative[i] = ( data[i] - lastValue[i]) / (1 / (frequency) );
51  if ( std::fabs(firstDerivative[i]) > firstDerivativePeak[i] ) {
52  firstDerivativePeak[i] = std::fabs(firstDerivative[i]);
53  }
54  }
55  if( data[i] < minValue[i] ) {
56  minValue[i] = data[i];
57  }
58  if( data[i] > maxValue[i] ) {
59  maxValue[i] = data[i];
60  }
61  }
62 
63  // deal with our moving window buffer
64  if(bufferSize > 0) {
65  if ( bufferPosition == bufferSize ) {
66  // shift the buffer and tack the new data value on the end
67  for ( int i = 0; i < numberOfDimensions; i++ ) {
68  cacheBuffer[i] = cacheBuffer[i].shift(1);
69  cacheBuffer[i][bufferPosition - 1] = data[i];
70  }
71  } else {
72  for ( int i = 0; i < numberOfDimensions; i++ ) {
73  cacheBuffer[i][bufferPosition] = data[i];
74  }
75  bufferPosition++;
76  }
77  }
78 
79  // finally, set the last values
80  lastValue = std::valarray<float>(data,numberOfDimensions);
81  }
82 
86  void process_state_message(IStateMessage *msg) override{}
87 
89  int getDimensions() const { return numberOfDimensions; }
90 
91  size_t getCacheBufferSize() { return bufferSize; }
92 
93  float getFrequency() const { return frequency; }
94 
95  protected:
96  friend void testGenericProcessor ();
98  long numberOfSamples = 0;
99 
101  int numberOfDimensions = MAX_BIOPROCESSOR_DIMENSIONS;
102 
103  int bufferPosition = 0;
104 
105  int bufferSize = DEFAULT_CACHE_BUFFER_SIZE;
106 
107  float frequency = DEFAULT_FREQUENCY;
108 
109  //channelCacheData[][];
110 
112  std::valarray<float> averageValue{};
113 
114  std::valarray<float> lastAverageValue{};
115 
116  std::valarray<float> lastSquareSummationValue{};
117 
118  std::valarray<float> lastValue{};
119 
120  std::valarray<float> maxValue{};
121 
122  std::valarray<float> minValue{};
123 
124  std::valarray<float> firstDerivative{};
125 
126  std::valarray<float> firstDerivativePeak{};
127 
128  std::valarray<std::valarray<float>> cacheBuffer;
129 
130  std::valarray<float> rmsValue{};
131 
132  virtual void initChannels(){
133 
134  averageValue.resize(numberOfDimensions);
135  lastAverageValue.resize(numberOfDimensions);
136  lastValue.resize(numberOfDimensions);
137  maxValue.resize(numberOfDimensions);
138  minValue.resize(numberOfDimensions);
139  firstDerivative.resize(numberOfDimensions);
140  firstDerivativePeak.resize(numberOfDimensions);
141  lastSquareSummationValue.resize(numberOfDimensions);
142  rmsValue.resize(numberOfDimensions);
143  resizeCache(bufferSize);
144 
145  resetProcessor();
146  cacheReset();
147  }
148 
149  virtual void resetProcessor(){
150  for ( int i = 0; i < numberOfDimensions; i++ ) {
151  averageValue[i] = 0.0;
152  lastAverageValue[i] = 0.0;
153  lastValue[i] = 0.0;
154  maxValue[i] = std::numeric_limits<float>::min();
155  minValue[i] = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
156  firstDerivative[i] = 0.0;
157  firstDerivativePeak[i] = 0.0;
158  lastSquareSummationValue[i] = 0.0;
159  rmsValue[i]=0.0;
160  }
161  numberOfSamples = 0;
162  }
163 
164  virtual void resizeCache(size_t cachesize){
165  if ( cachesize < 0 ) { return; } // TODO:ERROR CODES
166  //set the number of dimensions
167  cacheBuffer.resize(numberOfDimensions);
168  for ( int j = 0; j < numberOfDimensions; j++ ) {
169  cacheBuffer[j].resize(cachesize);
170  }
171  // reset size and position vars
172  bufferSize = cachesize;
173  bufferPosition = 0;
174  }
175 
176  virtual void cacheReset() {
177  bufferPosition = 0;
178  for ( int i = 0; i < numberOfDimensions ; i++) {
179  for ( int j = 0; j < bufferSize; j++ ) {
180  cacheBuffer[i][j] = 0.0;
181  }
182  }
183  }
184 
185 
186 };
